awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Paul McCartney plays himself in another exaggerated "Day In the Life." Included are fictional scenes of the star preparing to film two videos, rehearsing in a loft, playing for the BBC, and even dreaming up a rather horrific nightmare. A loosely developed plot about missing master tapes ties all these events together
plot: Paul McCartney's recording of his new album is complicated by the fact that the master tapes of his recordings are missing.
title: Give My Regards to Broad Street
